verses.verse: Out of the depths I have cried to thee, O Lord:
Lord, hear my voice. Let thy ears be attentive to the voice of my supplication.

If thou, O Lord, wilt mark iniquities: Lord, who shall stand it. (4)For with thee there is merciful forgiveness: and by reason of thy law, I have waited for thee, O Lord. My soul hath relied on his word: (5)my soul hath hoped in the Lord. (6)From the morning watch even until night, let Israel hope in the Lord. (7)Because with the Lord there is mercy: and with him plentiful redemption. (8)And he shall redeem Israel from all his iniquities.
